name: Sons of Light
description:
The world is dark and bleak. There isn't much hope... until a light shines in the darkness.

Give this light to as many as you can, before you lose the  chance to.

Writing: Clementine Chng
Art and Audio: Lois Chng
Programming: Tan Kang Soon
